1.「この大会は モンスター酒場組合所属の| 善良なスライムくんたちと みなさんが|:
This tournament is a game of hide-and-seek|between you and the good slimes of the|Monster Tavern Guild! The good slimes are|
|hiding all over the venue using various|techniques... If you find a hidden slime...|If you find a hidden slime, approach it and|
|say, "I found it!" That's it! You'll get|points based on the type of slime you find!|You can also work with your friends to find|
|slime, so... The total of the points earned|by everyone who participates becomes your|points. Let's work together and earn points!

2.「高得点を狙うときに おトクな| チャンスゲージと チャンスターゲットについて|:
I'll explain about the chance gauge and the|chance target... First of all, the Chance|Gauge is a gauge that increases when you find|
|a slime. Find more and more slimes to build|up your gauge! When your chance gauge is up,|Von Dette will tell you which slimes are the|
|chance targets... If you find the same type|of slime as the chance target, you double|your score... Aim and find more and more!|
|There's a time limit on the chance targets,|and if your time is up, your chance is over,|so be careful... The time limit can also be|
|extended by finding other types of slime that|aren't targeted... And guess what... If you|find all the slime in the chance target|
|within the time limit, the next chance target|will be a higher score! If you clear more and|more chance targets and get high-scoring,|
|high-magnification slime, you'll be able to|get great points!

3.「この大会には いろんな種類の| スライムくんたちが 参加していま～す。| たと:
There are many different kinds of slimes|participating in this competition... For|example... The ordinary blue slime, the red|
|be... They don't score much, but they're|hiding all over the venue, so let's find|them! Next, the slime tower... We all say,|
|"We found it! Then the slime will pile up and|everyone will get a point! And don't forget|the Metal Slime! A lot of them will appear|
|during the fever time in the second half, so|find them and score as many points as you|can... And then there's the angel slime...|
|This one increases my Chance Gauge a lot...|And the Lemon Slime will help you clear|difficult chance targets by stocking up on|
|them... The targets you clear with Lemon|Slime won't count towards your score, but|they will help you get to the next high score|
|opportunity faster, so use them to your|advantage~! There may be more secret slime|monsters hiding in the hall... You'll be|
|lucky if you find one!

4.「みんなで見つけられる スライムタワーくんや| ヒミツのスライムくんたちは 誰か:
Slime Tower and Secret Slime can be found by|everyone, and when someone finds them, the|location where they were found will be marked|
|on the map! When someone finds the slime|towers, open the map and check it out... Use|them well to get a high score!

5.「景品は ポイントを貯めると もらえます。| 大会に参加するごとに スコアをポイ:
You can get prizes by accumulating points...|Each time you participate in a tournament,|your score will be added to your points, so|
|keep participating and collect as many as you|can! You'll also be able to record your party|score and view it as a ranking among your|
|friends and team. Aim for the number one|spot!

6.「参加したみんなでゲットした 得点の合計が| 一定のハイスコアを 達成したら|:
If the total of the scores obtained by all|the participants reaches a certain high|score, we'll give away a souvenir! There are|
|three levels of memorabilia... The next one|is for <%nM_LUA_NUM_1> points or more, so be|sure to aim for that... I'll let you know|
|what you get... If you want to get a high|score souvenir, you'll have to talk to me|during the event...

7.「参加したみんなでゲットした 得点の合計が| 一定のハイスコアを 達成したら|:
If the total of the scores obtained by all|the participants reaches a certain high|score, we'll give away a souvenir! There are|
|three levels of souvenirs... There are three|levels... And You've already taken all the mementos...|That's my girl!
